modName: Sansa Stark Follower from HBO Game of Thrones
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5][b][color=#4C1130] SANSA STARK FOLLOWER [/color]

[size=3]Sansa is a STANDALONE FOLLOWER which means no other mods will be required.
　You can use this mod with no problem whatever body types you're using.
[color=#ead1dc]REPORT ME ANY ISSUES PLEASE..[/color]
[size=3][color=#741B47]
[Follower detail][/color]
[/size]
Name : Sansa
Race : Nord
Level : 7
Voice : Young Eager
Body : UNP
Textures: Pride of Valhalla - Super HD Skin Set for UNP by Dracofish aka MelissaGT
(Midgard version)
Weight : 30
Default Spell : Conjure Familiar
Location : Dragon's Reach - Whiterun
Combat Style : combat assassin
[size=2][size=3]She is Merriable and unkillable
[/size]
